casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Rontel Vincae ROYSTER 441A18-1 Supreme Court of North Carolina. February 8, 2019 Geeta Kapur, Attorney at Law, for Royster, Rontel Vincae Kristin Jo Uicker, Assistant Attorney General, Patrick Nadolski, District Attorney, for State of North Carolina

The following order has been entered on the Motion for Extension of Time to File Brief filed on the 7th of February 2019 by State of NC:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 8th of February 2019."

Plaintiff-Appellant shall have up to and including the 25th day of February 2019 to file and serve his/her brief with this Court.
